name: Octopulous 2: Twice Upon a Time
description:
Welcome to Octopulous 2: Twice Upon a Time! #platformer #shooter

The adventure continues! Octopi is back for a second and much bigger adventure, but this time his home solar system depends on it!

The world was living in perfect peace and serenity after Octopi saved it by collecting the five life gems. But disaster was brewing! The gems have been stolen by an unknown evil, and are now being used for the worst acts ever committed! It's now up to Octopi to save the world, Twice Upon a Time.
  • Venture through five hazardous worlds, one more dangerous than the other!
  • Fight 5 dangerous bosses, even the bravest of warriors are afraid of battling them!
  • Travel between worlds using your trusty air balloon and shoot your way through enemies using your new seed projectiles!

Just open the file you downloaded called "octopulous2_demo.exe".
